thread.title: Green Bridge Technologies launches CDP's New Industry Standard Natural Gas Vehicle Systems
thread.title_full: Green Bridge Technologies launches CDP's New Industry Standard Natural Gas Vehicle Systems - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Green Bridge Technologies launches CDP's New Industry Standard Natural Gas Vehicle Systems
text:
Icom North America, LLC
NEW HUDSON, Mich. Green Bridge Technologies, LLC (GBT) of New Hudson, Michigan announces the launch of CDP's New Industry Standard Natural Gas Vehicle Systems.
Green Bridge Technologies assembles, markets and distributes CDP's EPA Certified Natural Gas Vehicle Systems across North America .
Green Bridge Technologies is part of the Icom Group, the industry leader in Alternative Fuel Systems.
Kevin Fern CEO of CDP and well known Natural Gas Vehicle System Developer and Calibrator: "The CDP NGV System is the new industry standard for Natural Gas Vehicles. Performance and miles per gallon meet or exceed the gasoline versions."
Albert Venezio CEO of Green Bridge Technologies: "We chose to launch with the Chevrolet Trax and Cruze as they fit a key fleet segment that was under-supported such as: utilities, municipalities, government agencies, livery and medical delivery fleets. Drive one today and experience the difference."
Ralph Perpetuini Chairman of Green Bridge Technologies: "The Icom Group has now expanded into Natural Gas Vehicle Systems with the best performing technology in the industry. The addition of an Innovative Natural Gas System Technology will continue to support our role as an industry leader in the Alternative Fuel world."
